snippet.title: How Amber Heard Became Hollywood's Biggest Villain...
snippet.description:
The Downfall of Amber Heard: How She Became Hollywood's Biggest Villain...

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT 👇

Amber Heard Exposed After Leaked LAPD Footage…

https://youtu.be/U8kIY_JREHk

Related videos:

Johnny Depp FINALLY Speaks On How Amber Heard Tried To Ruin Him

https://youtu.be/tdXBUL9WunQ

Amber Heard’s Lawyer QUITS & EXPOSES Amber For Ruining Johnny Depp!?

https://youtu.be/B9ZaUwfDvg4

Amber Heard’s Lawyer EXPOSES Her For Ruining Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/pZR2_v4UpgI

After years of litigation, you may well assume that Depp's career is in shambles,
and his reputation has been irretrievably damaged. Amber Heard accused
Johnny Depp of being ab*sive towards her and described Johnny Depp being
angry, hostile and threatening. Johnny Depp was even called a ‘wife-beater’
which ruined his career absolutely. One by one, he started losing the roles and it
seemed there was no way out. But tables got turned and in 2021 the narrative
has completely changed. Right now there are much more fans who think that
Amber Heard was the ab*ser and she tried to frame Johnny Depp to ruin his
career.
Make sure you stay till the end to see Amber Heard’s vicious plan against
Johnny Depp and what indicates that Amber was using Johnny Depp for her
own purposes.
Let's get back for a while to the fact that Amber Heard said she had been
assaulted by Johnny Depp on more than 14 occasions. She said she had, at
times, been in fear for her life and left with a broken nose, black eyes and split
lip. Vicious, drunken tirades had, she said, lasted for days. There was also a 15th
allegation too traumatic and personal to be heard in open court. The whole
world was shocked and these allegations even made Amber Heard a hero as not
every victim of domestic violence is brave enough to speak. Since then, Amber
Heard has become a vocal campaigner on the issue of domestic and sexual
abuse. The UN Human Rights Campaign named her as a Human Rights
Champion for her work promoting women's rights. She became an Ambassador
for Women's Rights for the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) and she
has given speeches and written in the Washington Post and New York Times
about her experience of domestic violence.
In the era of Me Too, she was a leading figure, speaking up for women who had
suffered in silence by revealing the abuse she had endured at the hands of one of
the most powerful people in Hollywood. She was Amber Heard, actor, model,
activist and domestic abuse survivor. However, her own assistant exposed
Amber Heard for using her s*xual assault story. Since then (and many other
situations when Amber Heard was exposed for lying, being aggressive or
violent), fans and even experts started analyzing Amber Heard’s behavior.

The first thing that attracted attention was Amber Heard’s body language. When
body language analysts made a conclusion that Amber Heard lied in court
(when there was a leaked audio case), everyone started looking closely at
several photos and videos of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard together. In almost
every photo taken at the beginning of their relationship Johnny Depp looks very
much into Amber Heard. He looks at her like someone who really loves Amber.
While the actress doesn’t really care, she is way more into the cameras and
spotlight. But then it became even worse, and you don’t need to be a
relationship expert to understand that. 

And now I want to know your opinion about Amber Heard’s behaviour. Do you
think Amber Heard never loved Johnny Depp and just used him for fame? Let
me know your opinion in the comments section down below.
Thanks for watching this video and don’t forget to hit that subscribe button.

tags: amber heard johnny depp fight video
johnny depp and amber heard fight
